urls.title: Air pollution
urls.description: Air pollution harms human health and the environment. In Europe, emissions of many air pollutants have decreased substantially over the past decades, resulting in improved air quality across the region. However, air pollutant concentrations are still too high, and air quality problems persist. A significant proportion of Europe‚Äôs population live in areas, especially cities, where exceedances of air quality standards occur.

urls.title: Sustainability: What are the alternatives to economic growth?
urls.description: How can societies and people prosper and grow without harming the environment and climate?
